name: Revaniv's Tower
description:
Knight, welcome to Revaniv's Tower !
Here is your quest : Revaniv, a vile wizard, has cast a curse on the kingdom of Algebra, and threatened its inhabitants.

Make hast, time's running out! You have to climb up to the top of its tower and defeat him!
Will you be brave enough to triumph over the wizard and save the world?

If you feel ready to go, you can download our game on GitHub (https://github.com/yohanfaj/Revaniv-Tower) or here, on itch.io.
You can also watch the trailer of the game right here :

We wish you good luck in your journey!

---------------------------------------------------------

Revaniv's Tower is a Python platformer game developped by five EFREI's students for the L1 Transversal Project : Adrien Barbier, Yohan Fajerman, Danny Graine, Elouan Larroche & Camille Salaun (INT 1 promo 2025).

- Main Screen Fanfare : The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past - Hyrule Castle
- LevelMusic : Super Mario Bros. – Castle Theme
- Time Running Out Jingle: Super Mario World – Hurry Up!

- Life Lost Jingle: Super Mario Bros. - You're Dead Theme

- Potion Jingle: Super Mario Bros. – 1-UP Mushroom Sound Effect 
- Victory Music: Cadence of Hyrule – Glockenspiel Obtained 
- Game Over Music: Hades – Death and I
- Trailer Theme: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past – Time of the Falling Rain
